Description of incident: Walgreens customers saw the prescription information of other customers when they attempted to log into their accounts on the Walgreens.com site.  The website problem existed for at least two months and also allowed customers to see the phone numbers, names of prescribing doctors, names of medications, the amount the prescriptions were purchased for and the dates of the purchases. A customer alerted a local store to the problem, but had to contact the media when the problem persisted two months later.
